[0, 2024, 4048, 6072, 8096, 10120, 12144, 14168, 16192, 18216]


0 -> 1

1 -> 2024 -> 20 24 -> 2 0 2 4

2 -> 4048 -> 40 48 -> 4 0 4 8

3 -> 6072 ... -> 6 0 7 2

4 -> 8096 ... -> 8 0 9 6

5 -> 10120 -> 20482880 -> 2048 2880 ... -> 2 0 4 8 2 8 8 0

6 -> 12144 -> 24579456 ...

7 -> 14168 -> 28676032 ...

8 -> 16192 -> 32772608 ...

9 -> 18216 -> 36869184 ...

all 1 digit nums expand into 4 or 8 digits

28 -> 2 8

4

3179 -> 3 1 7 9

96938 -> 196202512 -> 397113884288 -> 397113 884288 -> 397 113 884 288
->
